Class ViewCatalogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerGui.ViewCatalogController

    IScreen
    public class ViewCatalogController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScreen
    Controller class for the view catalog screen.

      • generateItem

        public boolean generateItem​(ItemInMachineEntity item,
                            double discountPrice,
                            int i,
                            int j)
        The generateItem method generates a GUI element for displaying information about an ItemInMachineEntity object, as well as adding functionality for adding and removing the item from a cart, and modifying the item's quantity in the cart.
        Parameters:
        item - The ItemInMachineEntity object to be displayed in the GUI element.
        discountPrice - The discount price to be applied to the item.
        i - An integer value representing the row position of the GUI element in a grid.
        j - An integer value representing the column position of the GUI element in a grid.
        Returns:
        A GridPane object representing the generated GUI element.

      • getMinusEvent

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> getMinusEvent​(javafx.scene.control.Label amountLabel,
                                                                               javafx.scene.control.Button plusBtn,
                                                                               javafx.scene.control.Button itemInCartPlusBtn,
                                                                               javafx.scene.control.Button addToCartBtn,
                                                                               javafx.scene.layout.GridPane newItemInCart,
                                                                               ItemInMachineEntity item,
                                                                               javafx.scene.control.Label itemInCartAmountLabel,
                                                                               boolean flag)
        This method creates and returns an EventHandler that handles MouseEvent. When the event is triggered (by clicking a button), it performs several actions: Decrement the value displayed in the amountLabel by 1. Check if the plus button is disabled, if true, it enables it. Check if the amount is now 0, if true, it makes the addToCartBtn visible and clickable and remove the item from the cart. If the amount is not 0, it updates the itemInCartAmountLabel with the new amount and updates the item's quantity in the cart. If the flag is true, it hides the viewCartPane and updates the cart total labels.
        Parameters:
        amountLabel - a Label that holds the current amount of the item
        plusBtn - a button that increases the amount of the item
        itemInCartPlusBtn - a button that increases the amount of the item in the cart
        addToCartBtn - a button that adds the item to the cart
        newItemInCart - a GridPane that holds the item information in the cart
        item - an ItemInMachineEntity object that represents the item
        itemInCartAmountLabel - a Label that holds the current amount of the item in the cart
        flag - a boolean value that indicates whether to hide the viewCartPane or not.
        Returns:
        an EventHandler that handles the MouseEvent

      • getPlusEvent

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> getPlusEvent​(javafx.scene.control.Label amountLabel,
                                                                              javafx.scene.control.Button plusBtn,
                                                                              javafx.scene.control.Button itemInCartPlusBtn,
                                                                              javafx.scene.control.Button addToCartBtn,
                                                                              javafx.scene.layout.GridPane newItemInCart,
                                                                              ItemInMachineEntity item,
                                                                              javafx.scene.control.Label itemInCartAmountLabel,
                                                                              boolean flag)
        This method creates an event handler for the 'plus' button, which increases the amount of an item in the cart by 1.
        Parameters:
        amountLabel - The label that displays the current amount of the item in the cart
        plusBtn - The plus button that the event handler is being created for
        itemInCartPlusBtn - The plus button in the cart view of the item
        addToCartBtn - The add to cart button of the item
        newItemInCart - The GridPane representing the item in the cart view
        item - The item that is being added to the cart
        itemInCartAmountLabel - The label in the cart view that displays the current amount of the item
        flag - A flag indicating whether the cart view should be closed when the button is clicked
        Returns:
        An EventHandler for the plus button that increases the amount of the item in the cart.

        Update the cart bubble (shopping cart icon) on the user interface.
        Parameters:

      • createSingleCatalogItem

        private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane createSingleCatalogItem()
        This method creates a single catalog item for the catalog view. It creates a GridPane and sets its size and style. It also creates column and row constraints for the GridPane. An ImageView and a button bar are created and added to the GridPane.
        Returns:
        A GridPane that represents a single catalog item.

      • createSingleCartItem

        private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane createSingleCartItem()
        Creates a GridPane layout container that represents a single item in the cart. This method sets the layout, dimensions, and styles of the GridPane as well as creates and adds all of the child elements (such as ImageView and Label) to the GridPane.
        Returns:
        gridPane, a GridPane layout container representing a single item in the cart

      • showDescription

        void showDescription​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is used to show the description of the ViewCatalog screen when the 'description' button is pressed. It creates a popup window with the information about the screen, using the CommonFunctions class and the ScreensNamesEnum.
        Parameters:
        event - the event triggered when the 'description' button is pressed
